about.details:
Incorporated in May 2010, Divyadhan Recycling Industries Limited manufactures Recycled Polyester Staple Fibre (R-PSF) and Recycled Pellets.

The company is certified for Quality Management System (ISO 14001:2015) and Environmental Management System (ISO 14001:2015) for manufacturing Recycled Polyester Staple Fibre.

The company operates in two business verticals:-

  • Recycled Fiber: The company produces synthetic fibre known as Recycled Polyester Staple Fiber (R-PSF) from PET bottles, such as those used for Coke, soda, water, and other post-consumer PET bottles.
  • Recycled Pellets/chips: They also manufacture pellets called recycled pellets, which are sourced from the same raw materials as recycled polyester staple fiber.

The Company's manufacturing unit is located in Village Kalyanpur, Tehsil Baddi, Dist Solan Himachal, and has a total capacity of 8030 metric tons per annum for fibre and 4320 metric tons per annum for pellets.

As of August 31, 2024, the company had around 83 employees in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 3776000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.17 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹64 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 26, 2024, and closes on September 30, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,28,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO will be done on Tuesday, October 1, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, October 3, 2024. Check the Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Divyadhan Recycling Industries IPO listing date is on Friday, October 4, 2024.
